title: Hextech skin unavailable
body: Rerolled 3 skins into a Count Vladimir but it's locked. In Store->Account it's listed in the purchase history but I can't use it. Tried relogging a few times but it didn't work.

replies.body:
I'm starting to see quite a bit of these weird store issues crop up for you guys on EUNE. I'm doing my best to help out, but I'd like you to go ahead and hit up out agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well so that we can start tracking this issue in case it becomes a trend! 

Check your collection now, I had to give him a little push but Count Vlad should be lurking around somewhere in the corner or something.
Just saw your reply, it worked like a charm back then. Please accept my late thanks!
